alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 2:10PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ROAN AND TAVAPUTS PLATEAUS... FLAT TOPS...DEBEQUE TO SILT CORRIDOR...AND CENTRAL YAMPA RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 50 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 207 PM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 35 miles northeast of Rangely to 7 miles southwest of Meeker moving east at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Meeker around 220 PM MST. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 52 and 82. Colorado 13 between mile markers 14 and 82. Colorado 64 between mile markers 68 and 73. Colorado 318 between mile markers 56 and 60. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
